thread.title: Fed Chairman Powell Taps Two Advisers

author: Nick Timiraos
title: Fed Chairman Powell Taps Two Advisers

organizations.name: fed chairman powell taps two advisers federal reserve

text:
Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell has tapped two monetary policy specialists to serve as senior advisers, according to people familiar with the matter.
Jon Faust, a professor of economics at Johns Hopkins University, will return to the Fed to advise Mr. Powell on a part-time basis. He served as a senior adviser to Mr. Powellâ€™s predecessors, Ben Bernanke and Janet Yellen, from 2012 to 2014.
